message.content:
cs.DC, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.NI 

The paper discusses a structured system for distributed mechanism design, which involves distributed decision making and communication among players. This falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses game theory and the implementation of tax-based mechanisms, which falls under the category of Game Theory and Decision Science (cs.GT). The system also includes fault-tolerance and distributed policing, which falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). The paper also mentions the use of Java for implementation, which falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI).
